verses.text:
The last call of mercy, now sounding so clear,
Is calling for you and for me;
O slight not the warning now ringing in your ear,
But haste to the Savior and be free!

O slight not the warning now ringing in your ear,
But haste to the Savior and be free;
O slight not the warning now ringing in your ear,
But haste to the Savior and be free!

The last call of mercy, now sounding so clear,

chorus.text:
Come now to Jesus, 'tis mercy's sweet call;
Come now to Jesus, 'tis mercy's sweet call.
